name: First-Person Shooter: Wave Game
description:
Description

This game is a College Project built around an enemy Wave Spawner feature. It is an FPS wave-based survival game where the player must survive through waves of enemies for as long as they can.

Controls

WASD- Movement Controls

Space Bar- Jump

Shift- Sprint

Left Mouse Click- Shoot

Right Mouse Click- Zoom In

R- Reload

Q- Gain Ammo

Scroll Wheel- Switch Weapon

Game Features

Wave System (Using set spawn points)

FPS Shooting Mechanic

FPS Movement

Health Pickups (Respawn in different location after picked up)

Ammo Refill (Fills ammo if the player presses Q and the reserve ammo is below 20, also removes 20HP from the player)

Timer

Weapon Switching

Bare Bones Scope In

UI
